Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.linkage

Linkages for hierarchical clustering.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Linkage
    Abstract interface for implementing a new linkage method into hierarchical clustering.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CentroidLinkage
    Centroid linkage — Unweighted Pair-Group Method using Centroids (UPGMC).
    CentroidLinkage.Parameterizer
    Class parameterizer.
    CompleteLinkage
    Complete-linkage ("maximum linkage") clustering method.
    CompleteLinkage.Parameterizer
    Class parameterizer.
    FlexibleBetaLinkage
    Flexible-beta linkage as proposed by Lance and Williams.
    FlexibleBetaLinkage.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    GroupAverageLinkage
    Group-average linkage clustering method (UPGMA).
    GroupAverageLinkage.Parameterizer
    Class parameterizer.
    MedianLinkage
    Median-linkage — weighted pair group method using centroids (WPGMC).
    MedianLinkage.Parameterizer
    Class parameterizer.
    MinimumVarianceLinkage
    Minimum increase in variance (MIVAR) linkage.
    MinimumVarianceLinkage.Parameterizer
    Class parameterizer.
    SingleLinkage
    Single-linkage ("minimum") clustering method.
    SingleLinkage.Parameterizer
    Class parameterizer.
    WardLinkage
    Ward's method clustering method.
    WardLinkage.Parameterizer
    Class parameterizer.
    WeightedAverageLinkage
    Weighted average linkage clustering method (WPGMA).
    WeightedAverageLinkage.Parameterizer
    Class parameterizer.

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical.linkage Description

Linkages for hierarchical clustering.
